ie.gmit.sw.language_detector

Interface LangDetectorStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CosineDistanceStrategy, FreqDistanceStrategy, OutOfPlaceStrategy, SimpleDistanceStrategy

    public interface LangDetectorStrategy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Lang findClosestLanguage(LangDist unidentifiedLang, LangDistStore store)
      Find the closest language based on a k-mer distribution and a LangDistStore.

    • Method Detail

      • findClosestLanguage

        Lang findClosestLanguage(LangDist unidentifiedLang,
                         LangDistStore store)
        Find the closest language based on a k-mer distribution and a LangDistStore.
        Parameters:
        unidentifiedLang - K-mer distribution of unidentified language sample.
        store - Store of known language k-mer distributions.
        Returns:
        Closest known language to the unknown language distribution, based on this strategy.
